allowed_num_of_buildings.description: Adds to the maximum number of building slots in a province. (Additive)

attack_bonus_in_capital_terrain.description: Grants attack bonus in provinces with the same terrain as capital province. (Constant)

attrition.description: Adds to the base attrition in a province. (Additive)

auto_explore_adjacent_to_colony.description: Grants the abiliy to automatically discover undiscovered provinces adjacent to colonies. (Constant)

can_bypass_forts.description: Allows units to ignore fort zones of control. (Constant)

can_chain_claim.description: Allows claims to be enacted through already claimed provinces. (Constant)

can_colony_boost_development.description: Grants bonus 1 tax, production and manpower on completed colonies. (Constant)

can_transfer_vassal_wargoal.description: Allows usage of the Transfer Subject peace term at half cost. (Constant)

cb_on_government_enemies.description: Acts a visible script flag. Can be checked in triggers with cb_on_government_enemies = yes (Constant)

cb_on_overseas.description: Allows claims to be fabricated on overseas provinces in Trade Company regions. (Constant)

cb_on_primitives.description: Allows claims to be fabricated on overseas provinces in Colonial regions. (Constant)

cb_on_religious_enemies.description: Acts a visible script flag. Can be checked in triggers with cb_on_religious_enemies = yes (Constant)

cs_only_local_development_cost.description:
Modifies the monarch power cost for development in a province. 
Does not appear or affect non-Common Sense owners. (Multiplicative)

extra_manpower_at_religious_war.description: Grants an increase in manpower recovery by a factor of 3 during religious wars. (Constant)

force_march_free.description: Allows usage of the force march action for free. (Constant)

fort_level.description: Adds to the fort level in a province, determining how difficult it is to siege. (Additive)

free_maintenance_on_expl_conq.description: Removes maintenance cost for explorers and conquisadors. (Constant)

garrison_growth.description: Modifies the rate of garrison growth in a province. (Multiplicative)

has_banners.description: Allows the usage of Manchu banner units. Country scope. (Constant)

idea_claim_colonies.description: Allows claims to be fabricated on overseas provinces in Colonial regions that are owned by by another nation that is alo overseas. (Constant)

ignore_coring_distance.description: Allows coring in any uncored province, regardless of distance. (Constant)

inflation_reduction_local.description: Adds to the base yearly inflation value. Requires every province in a country to have the modifier to work however. (Additive)

local_amount_of_banners.description: Modiifes the amount of banners that can be raised from a province. (Multiplicative)

local_autonomy.description: Adds to the autonomy rate in a province. (Additive)

local_build_cost.description: Modifies the cost of constructing buildings in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_build_time.description: Modifies the construction speed of buildings in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_colonial_growth.description: Adds to the colonial growth in a colony province. (Additive)

local_colonist_placement_chance.description: Adds to the placement chance in a colony province. (Additive)

local_core_creation.description: Modifies the cost of coring in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_culture_conversion_cost.description: Modifies the culture conversion cost in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_defensiveness.description: Modifies the defensiveness of a province, impacting siege phase length. (Multiplicative)

local_development_cost.description:
Modifies the monarch power cost for development in a province. 
Converts to local_tax_modifier in for non-Common Sense owners. (Multiplicative)

local_friendly_movement_speed.description: Modifies the movement speed of units in a province that are considered friendly. (Multiplicative)

local_has_banners.description: Allows Manchu banner units to be raised in owned provinces. Province scope. (Constant)

local_hostile_attrition.description: Adds to the base attrition for enemies in a province. (Additive)

local_hostile_movement_speed.description: Modifies the movement speed of units in a province that are considered enemies. (Multiplicative)

local_institution_spread.description: Modifies the spread of institutions in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_manpower.description: Adds to the base manpower value. 1 equals 1000 men. (Additive)

local_manpower_modifier.description: Modifies the manpower efficiency in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the missionary strength in a province. 1 equals 100% strength. (Additive)

local_monthly_devastation.description: Adds to the devastation rate in a province. (Additive)

local_naval_engagement_modifier.description: Modifies the naval engagement width in a province. Only usable in sea provinces. (Multiplicative)

local_production_efficiency.description: Modifies the production efficiency in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_regiment_cost.description: Modifies the recruitment cost of land units in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_sailors.description: Adds to the sailors value for a province. 1 equals 1 sailor. (Additive)

local_sailors_modifier.description: Modifies the sailors efficiency of a province. (Multiplicative)

local_ship_cost.description: Modifies the cost of ship recruitment in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_ship_repair.description: Modifies the speed of ship repair in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_state_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the state maintenance cost for the state that a province belongs to. (Multiplicative)

local_tax_modifier.description: Modifies the tax efficiency in a province. (Multiplicative)

local_unrest.description: Adds to the unrest value in a province. (Additive)

local_years_of_nationalism.description: Adds to the base nationalism value in a province. (Additive)

max_attrition.description: Adds to the maximum attrition that can be experienced in a province. (Additive)

may_establish_frontier.description: Allows the usage of the Siberean Frontier mechanic. (Constant)

may_explore.description: Allows the recruitment of explorers and conquisadors. (Constant)

may_perform_slave_raid.description: Allows ships to perform slave raids. (Constant)

may_recruit_female_generals.description: Allows the recruitment of female generals. (Constant)

min_local_autonomy.description: Sets the minimum autonomy value a province can have. (Constant)

no_religion_penalty.description: Removes the penalties associated with negative religious tolerance. (Constant)

province_trade_power_modifier.description: Modifies the trade power efficiency in a province. (Multiplicative)

province_trade_power_value.description: Adds to the trade power in a province. (Additive)

reduced_stab_impacts.description: Reduces the stability hits when taking diplomatic actions that cause them (i.e. Break Marriage). (Constant)

regiment_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the recruitment speed of land units in a province. (Multiplicative)

religious_conversion_resistance.description: Adds to conversion resistance from Centres of Reformation. (Additive)

sea_repair.description: Allows ships to repair in coastal sea zones adjacent to owned provinces. (Constant)

ship_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the recruitment speed of ships in a province. (Multiplicative)

supply_limit.description: Adds to the base supply limit of a province. (Additive)

supply_limit_modifier.description: Modifies the supply limit efficiency of a province. (Multiplicative)

tax_income.description: Adds to the yearly tax income of a province. (Additive)

trade_goods_size.description: Adds to the trade good size in a province (Additive)

trade_goods_size_modifier.description: Modifies the goods produced efficiency in a province. (Multiplicative)

trade_value.description: Adds to the base trade value in a province. (Additive)

trade_value_modifier.description: Modifies the base trade value in a province. (Multiplicative)
